definitions.definition: A prehistoric megalithic tomb consisting of a capstone supported by two or more upright stones, most having originally been covered with earth or smaller stones to form a barrow .
Any megalithic tomb, including passage graves and wedge tombs.

main_definition: ( historical ; strictly ) A prehistoric megalithic tomb consisting of a capstone supported by two or more upright stones, most having originally been covered with earth or smaller stones to form a barrow .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) Any megalithic tomb, including passage graves and wedge tombs.
